metadata.title: OB - Orange Store - E-commerce Checkout Flow
metadata.description: Optimization of the online purchase funnel

step.title: Context
step.content:
Persona: James, 34, small business owner purchasing equipment online between client calls. He needs a fast, reliable checkout with clear fees and delivery times.
Test goals: - Validate the clarity of the cart and checkout steps. - Ensure payment and delivery options are easy to compare. - Confirm error handling and recovery paths are clear.

step.title: Add product to cart
step.content:
From the Orange Store homepage, navigate to a product category. Open a product page and add one item to the cart.
Verify that the mini-cart or confirmation clearly shows the updated quantity and subtotal.

step.title: Review cart
step.content:
Open the cart. Check product title, quantity, unit price, and total price.
Update the quantity from 1 to 2 and confirm the total updates accordingly.

step.title: Checkout and delivery
step.content:
Proceed to checkout. Enter delivery information and compare available delivery options (costs and estimated dates).
Select the most suitable option and continue to payment.

step.title: Evaluation
step.content: Rate from 1 to 10: - Clarity of the cart overview. - Ease of selecting a delivery option. - Overall checkout experience.
step.question: Were fees, taxes, and delivery dates easy to understand at each step?
